text:
Great timely question: #Steroids & #COVID19 #vaccine 
IMHO
1-Discuss with patient(shared decision)
2-Avoid steroids if possible 2 weeks prior to first shot until 2 weeks(or more) after second shot.(empiric numbers)
3-use smaller steroids dose if necessary
#PainDocs @ASRA_Society https://t.co/4wnih8QSmO
